Read config.yml for the locations of sample sheet, pipeline output etc  
```{r, child="_settings.Rmd"}
```

```{r}
sampleName <- params$sample_name
krakenDir <- config$kraken_dir

kronaFile <- paste0("../",krakenDir,"/",sampleName,'_krona_report.html')
```


```{r,echo=F, eval=T}

library(htmltools)

htmltools::includeHTML(kronaFile)
```
